title: TensCare Nailit - Laser Unit to Improve Appearence of Finger and Toe Nails. Dual Hinge for Comfort and no Pinching. quick 7 Minute Sessions
features: IMPORVE APPEARENCE: helps to improve the appearance of fungal nails to give you the confidence to do what you love again
PROVEN TECHNOLOGY: utilising both infrared and blue light technology means you get the latest technology to efficiently clean your nails and improve their appearance
OINTMENT AND DRUG FREE: no need to continuously purchase expensive medication or ointments. The Nailit Device has continuous use, for one price, with a rechargeable battery
DUAL-ACTION HINGE: out innovative dual action hinge means the Nailit will fit on any sized fingers or toes with comfort, no painful clamping sensation..

NO SIDE EFFECTS: due to using infrared and blue light technology - you will feel no side effects,, unlike you potentially can with medicines or ointments. The unit is also pain free meaning you do not need to worry about anything. Sit back and relax with your 7 minute session and be on your way to visibly improved nails
